SKA — Sacred Knowledge Annex

Doctrine-free. Idea-rich.

SKACULT is a joke name for a serious habit: publishing things I make, and linking to things I think are worth your time.

Cult-ish aims

  • Build first, brand second.
  • Prefer artifacts over opinions.
  • Keep it small enough to finish.
  • Share the weird useful parts.
  • No sermons — only receipts (links).
